definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Each class elects two students to represent them on the School Council.
sentences.chinese: 每班选出两个学生代表参加学生会。

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾为香港科技大学学生会合唱团女高音声部部长。

sentences.english: Often students will band together to try to escape the Battleground.
sentences.chinese: 经常，学生会结合在一起试图从战场从逃出去。

sentences.english: The students receive the questions in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 学生会收到中英对照的题目。

sentences.english: Would the rest of the students really be willing to sit for that long waiting to eat?
sentences.chinese: 其他学生会在那里空等那么久才吃得上晚饭么？

sentences.english: No working experience limited, experience of serving for student union is a plus.
sentences.chinese: 应届生亦可，最好有学生会工作的经历。

sentences.english: The Student Union is waging a campaign against cheating .
sentences.chinese: 学生会正在开展一场反作弊运动。

sentences.english: If you would like to take part in the activities,please come to the Student Union to sign up before April 20th.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想参加活动，请于4月20日前来学生会报名。

sentences.english: Join a club, or a fraternity or sorority, or the student council.
sentences.chinese: 加入一个社团或者联谊会，又或者是学生会。

sentences.english: Never had special education students and sub-committee of the Hans in the hotel gathering.
sentences.chinese: 从来未过特教学生会和分团委在金汉斯饭店聚会。

sentences.english: The administrators of the QQ group are all leaders in the union.
sentences.chinese: 这个群的管理员都是学生会里的学生干部。

sentences.english: During the period of study for outstanding teachers recommend students will be honored to work.
sentences.chinese: 学习期间品学突出，荣幸被老师推荐学生会工作。

sentences.english: Liang wants to work at the Student Union at college.
sentences.chinese: 梁金成想去校学生会工作。

sentences.english: The students acknowledged the authority of the student council.
sentences.chinese: 学生们承认学生会的权威。

sentences.english: The most minatory seven ones in the dark force aginst The Student Union.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗力量中对学生会最有威胁的七个人。

sentences.english: I'm actually, I'm involved in the student government at my dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 我参加过我宿舍的学生会。

definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
